name: Wolvepack Hunting
description:
How To Play:

- use the analog stick to move the camera,

- click the dog to select it, click anywhere to move it toward certain position

- if the dog so close to the deer, click the deer to strike them

- make sure to turn on auto rotation on your android device

please note: this game is still a prototype, and maybe you encounter a glitch. Thank you for downloading hope you enjoy it. And thank you very much if you willing to donate:)
